src:
Želite dostopen 3D tiskalnik? Tu je Anet ET4

03 Nov 2019, 11:39

Tridimenzionalni tiskalniki so vse bolj priljubljeni tudi med domačimi uporabniki, saj omogočajo enostavno in hitro izdelavo izdelka zgolj na osnovi računalniškega modela. Navadno pa 3D tiskalniki niso poceni igrače, a zdaj si lahko za zmerno ceno že privoščite čisto svojega. Če torej za 3D tiskalnik niste pripravljeni odšteti veliko denarja, smo v spletni trgovini Cafago našli takšnega, ki za malo denarja ponuja veliko.
Gre za 3D tiskalnik Anet ET4 za katerega bomo na spletni povezavi https://bit.ly/2PuxRCG morali odšteti zgolj 148,98 evrov. Če upoštevamo, da je tridimenzionalni tiskalnik Anet ET4 uporaben, visokokakovosten in zmogljiv, ta cena res ni pretirana. Tiskalnik moramo pred prvo uporabo sami sestaviti. Podpira bogato paleto materialov, tiskalna plošča pa meri 220 x 220 x250 milimetrov. Tridimenzionalni tiskalnik lahko seveda priključimo na prenosne in namizne računalnike, ki imajo nameščen operacijski sistem Windows in MacOS.
Velja omeniti, da bomo 3D tiskalnik Anet ET4, ki je na spletni povezavi https://bit.ly/2PuxRCG naprodaj za 148,98 evrov, prejeli iz skladišča v Nemčiji. To pomeni, da zanj ne bomo plačali carinskih in drugih dajatev. Z nakupom pa nikakor ne gre odlašati, saj je ponudba veljavna le do konca novembra.

Obvestilo


Članek smo v uredništvu pripravili na osnovi objave v spletni trgovini. Pri nakupih iz spletnih trgovin veljajo pogoji nakupa posamezne trgovine. Pri navodilih ipd. pa obstaja možnost, da le-ta niso v slovenščini ali angleščini. Uredništvo ne prevzema odgovornosti za nakup. Za kakršne koli informacije ali reklamacije se obrnite na spletnega trgovca, uredništvo pa prosim obvestite (e-naslov uredništva: rn@stromboli.si), da se v bodoče opisom izdelkov iz teh spletnih strani lahko izognemo.




Povezave: Cafago
text:
Want an affordable 3D printer? There's the Anet ET4

03 Nov 2019, 11:39

3D printers are increasingly popular with home users as they make it easy and fast to build a product based solely on a computer model. Usually 3D printers are not cheap toys, but now you can afford yours for a reasonable price. So if you are not ready to deduct a lot of money for a 3D printer, we have found one in the Cafago online store that offers a lot of money.
This is a 3D Anet ET4 printer for which we will only have to deduct $ 148.98 from the https://bit.ly/2PuxRCG web link. Considering that the Anet ET4 3-D printer is usable, high quality and powerful, this price is really not an exaggeration. The printer must be assembled before use for the first time. It supports a wide range of materials, and the print plate measures 220 x 220 x 250 millimeters. Of course, a three-dimensional printer can be connected to laptops and desktops running Windows and MacOS.
It's worth mentioning that we will receive the Anet ET4 3D printer, available at https://bit.ly/2PuxRCG for $ 148.98, from a warehouse in Germany. This means that we will not pay any customs and other duties. However, the purchase should not be delayed, since the offer is valid until the end of November.

Notification


The article in the editorial was prepared on the basis of publication in an online store. Purchases from online stores are subject to the terms of purchase for each store. For instructions, etc. however, they may not be in Slovene or English. The Editorial Board assumes no responsibility for the purchase. Contact any online retailer for any information or complaints, and please inform the editorial office (editorial email: rn@stromboli.si) so that future product descriptions from these sites can be avoided.




Links: Cafago
